name: @nichoth/preact-connect
description: Observe view events and subscribe to state changes

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js --standalone preactConnect --exclude preact -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/index.js
scripts.build-stateful: mkdir -p dist && browserify stateful.js --standalone preactConnect --exclude preact -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/stateful.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run build-stateful

author: nichoth
